snippet: The Detroit Symphony Orchestra said Wednesday that it ended the 2013 fiscal year with a small surplus after raising $18.9 million in contributions.
abstract: The Detroit Symphony Orchestra said Wednesday that it ended the 2013 fiscal year with a small surplus after raising $18.9 million in contributions.

headline.main: Detroit Symphony Hails Its Healthier Finances
headline.print_headline: Detroit Symphony Hails Its Healthier Finances
